column4: Aside from a fresh install...how can I reset OR get my diff ubuntu desktops working again? Ubuntu 11.04, I generally use lxkde and decided to check out untiy again...every win I bring up has some background pic and I don't see anything that is to be IN the window...help?
I'm not sure if it's a window manager iss...(i.e. gdm or diff one )
Honestly can't remember how to check
My Unity is kind of messed up because I've been using gnome-shell. Reinstall is the only sure way to fix it.
